thread.title: Latest in Cutting Edge Technologies Revealed on WebmasterRadio.FM’s “Next Gen Now with Rudina Seseri”
thread.title_full: Latest in Cutting Edge Technologies Revealed on WebmasterRadio.FM’s “Next Gen Now with Rudina Seseri”

author: admin
title: Latest in Cutting Edge Technologies Revealed on WebmasterRadio.FM’s “Next Gen Now with Rudina Seseri”
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/14/2015 @ 12:53 PM Companies mentioned in this article: WebmasterRadio.FM 
SCOTTSDALE, Ariz. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- WebmasterRadio.FM, the premier business internet radio network, announces its new radio show, “ Next Gen Now With Rudina Seseri .” Ms. Seseri is the technology Venture Capitalist behind such companies as Jibo, Celtra, SocialFlow, CrowdTwist, and Statisfy. 
“‘Next Gen Now with Rudina Seseri’ will feature the innovative disruptors leading their industries and will discuss how their advancements are changing our world,” said WebmasterRadio.FM’s Brandy Shapiro-Babin. 
“ Next Gen Now with Rudina Seseri ” premieres Monday, September 14th with debut guest Galen Moore, Editor-in-Chief at Streetwise Media, with an initial line-up also including Technology Reporter for the Boston Globe, Scott Kirsner; Drizly CEO, Nicholas Rellas; and Jibo’s CEO Steve Chambers. 
“I am very excited to discuss the next generation of technologies and the life-changing impact these inventions and their commercialization have with the ‘Next Gen Now’ audience on WebmasterRadio.FM,” stated Ms. Seseri. “Not only will we discuss what is happening in these industries, but we will also discuss the challenging questions that some of these new technologies bring up. Listeners can expect a direct, challenging and highly engaging discussion that they will not want to miss.” 
As a lead investor and board director for its portfolio of technology investments, Ms. Seseri works with her companies on their strategic direction and growth, partnerships and lead generation. Since 2013, she has served as an Entrepreneur-in-Residence at Harvard Business School. She previously led acquisitions and investments in the Corporate Development Group at Microsoft Corporation and as an investment banker at Credit Suisse. 
New episodes of “Next Gen Now with Rudina Seseri” air Mondays at 4:00 p.m. ET on WebmasterRadio.FM. Programs are available in podcast format through all major podcast portals including iHeartRadio, iTunes, TuneIn, Stitcher and Spreaker. 
About WebmasterRadio.FM 
WebmasterRadio.FM lifts the "veiled curtain" of the Internet, bringing the business community together through an interactive radio network. WebmasterRadio.FM's line-up includes; “ Market Edge ” with Racepoint Global Chairman Larry Weber , “ Purse Strings ” with Marketing-to-Women Expert Maria Reitan, and the “ CyberLaw and Business Report ” with Internet Law Center Founder Bennet Kelley.
